laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. Reference Range-Negative.

Gallbladder is markedly distended, with a 2.5 cm x 2.1 cm x 1.6 cm impacted stone at the neck. Multiple additional stones present in gallbladder fundus, layering sludge present, diffuse gallbladder wall edema up to 7 mm. The liver is normal in echogenicity, mild intrahepatic biliary dilation noted, common duct measures 4 mm.
